title: New: CHYMES – Bloom
body:
Australia shows once again that it’s miles ahead of other countries when it comes to it’s dazzling electronic scene.

Sydney duo released a four track EP last year which saw considerable blog and Spotify success, and have now followed it up with latest track, Bloom. Keeping it simple yet sparklingly effective, Bloom sits somewhere between the energetic pop of Sylvan Esso or Purity Ring and the smoother, more R&B inspired Tei Shi. Check it out below.
